overview: Bad Santa and Sick Granny have left hell. With their intention to lure people to hell, DickFace, Regga and Cool Santa have to stop them by making fun. On their journey they meet a lot of nice people and of course some really messed-up people.
tagline: LOL & The Rise of Evil, LOL and the rise of evil
